name: Art Williams & Harry Wendt Aeronautical Engineering School
about: The Art Williams & Harry Wendt Aeronautical Engineering School is a premier institution in the Caribbean dedicated to training aircraft maintenance engineers. Approved and certified by the Guyana Civil Aviation Authority, Trinidad & Tobago Civil Aviation Authority, Civil Aviation Safety Authority Suriname, and Jamaica Civil Aviation Authority, the school offers a comprehensive ab-initio training program. This program, spanning three and a quarter years, includes theoretical, skills, and practical training, preparing students for the Aircraft Maintenance Engineerâ€™s Licence. The school is ISO 9001 certified and a member of the Flight Safety Foundation and International Federation of Airworthiness. It recently received approval for a BSc in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering, enhancing career opportunities for its graduates. The school's mission is to develop highly trained aircraft maintenance engineers, ensuring safety and excellence in air transport within Guyana and globally.
services:
["Induction Courses
Ab-Initio Training
External Training

Courses in Bachelor of Science in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering"]
